item.title: Sarah add a quote by Brandon Mull
item.description: "Smart people learn from their mistakes. But the real sharp ones learn from the mistakes of others." -- Brandon Mull

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Sarah Mylnowski
item.description: "How could I ask for a better friend? Someone who gives me a backup plan. Instead of someone who makes me the backup plan." -- Sarah Mylnowski

item.title: Sarah add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "And so with the sunshine and the great bursts of leaves growing on the trees, just as things grow in fast movies, I had that familiar conviction that life was beginning over again with the summer." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "Life is a storm, my young friend. You will bask in the sunlight one moment, be shattered on the rocks the next. What makes you a man is what you do when that storm comes. You must look into that storm and shout as you did in Rome. Do your worst, for I will do mine! Then the fates will know you as we know you" -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "But think of Adam and Eve like an imaginary number, like the square root of minus one: you can never see any concrete proof that it exists, but if you include it in your equations, you can calculate all manner of things that couldn't be imagined without it." -- Philip Pullman

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "They're already taking my future! They can't have the things that mattered to me in the past!" -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "It felt like my teeth were sweating. Eoin Colfer's The Legend of Spud Murphy" -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Sarah add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The breaking of so great a thing should make A greater crack: the round world Should have shook lions into civil streets, And citizens to their dens." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "Have no fear of perfection - you'll never reach it." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Derek Landy
item.description: "Being a detective isn't all about torture and murder and monsters. Sometimes it gets truly unpleasant...The fate of the world may depend on whether or not you can bring yourself to visit your relatives." -- Derek Landy
